## loadConfiguration() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Initialize configuration from environment variables or configuration object and set the global instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function loadConfiguration(configuration?: Configuration): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  configuration | [Configuration](./teamsfx.configuration.md) | Optional configuration that overrides the default configuration values. The override depth is 1. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

[InvalidParameter](./teamsfx.errorcode.md) when configuration is not passed in when in browser environment
